## getName() function

convert package name to umd variable name

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getName(packageName: string): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                | Description |
| ----------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| packageName | <code>string</code> |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

normalized and PascalCased packageName

## Example

```ts
getName('my.lib'); // => MyLib
getName('@my-scope/my-lib'); // => MyScopeMyLib
```
